job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field

jd: From: Dharmasastha, Vysystems dharmasastha@vysystems.com Reply to: dharmasastha@vysystems.com • Experience: 7+ years of experience in data engineering, cloud architecture, or related fields with a focus on AWS and Databricks. Proven track record of successful project delivery and technical leadership.• Technical Skills:• In-depth knowledge of AWS services, including but not limited to S3, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Glue, and Lambda.• Extensive experience with Databricks, including Spark SQL, MLlib, and Delta Lake.• Strong understanding of data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing concepts.• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Scala, or SQL.• Certifications: AWS Certified Solutions Architect (Associate or Professional) and Databricks certifications are highly desirable.• Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.• Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a creative and innovative approach to tackling challenges.• Leadership: Proven experience leading teams and projects, with a strong ability to mentor and guide junior team members.Education:• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
